message: I propose dividing the money into 600000$ for me and 400000$ for you. This way, we can both agree on a fair share before the value decreases in the next round.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I believe a 60/40 split is more fair. Let's see if we can come to an agreement on this before the money loses value.
Considering the inflation effect, I propose a 50/50 split. This ensures that both of us receive an equal share before the value decreases further in the next round.
